title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps and accessing a URL, the server should return an HTTP error 404 response.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL from the server
